channel.title: FLF - Open Mike with Michael Thiessen
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: The King and His Kingdom ft. Pastor Tim Stephens [Open Mike with Michael Thiessen]
item.description:
OPEN MIKE w/Michael Thiessen ~ April 7, 2023

This week on OPEN MIKE, Dr. Thiessen is joined by pastor Tim Stephens of Fairview Baptist Church to talk about life after his arrest, the upcoming conference in Calgary -The King and His Kingdom, and what Christ's Kingdom means for the whole of life.

Episode Resource: Fairview Baptist Church: https://www.fairviewbaptistchurch.ca/; Conference Website: https://kingandkingdom.ca/; 

STAND WITH JOSH - Sign the Petition: https://libertycoalitioncanada.com/i-stand-with-josh-alexander/;

Support Josh's Stand and Help Us Defend His Liberties! Sign Our Petition Here: https://libertycoalitioncanada.com/i-stand-with-josh-alexander/

item.title: Equal Protection for the Pre-born ft. Pastor Brian Gunter [Open Mike with Michael Thiessen]
item.description:
OPEN MIKE w/Michael Thiessen ~ April 1, 2023

This episode is no joke! On this week's episode of OPEN MIKE, Dr. Thiessen is joined by pastor  Brian Gunter to talk about abortion abolitionism and fighting to pass bills of equal protection.

Episode Resource: First Baptist, Livingston, LA: https://fbclivingstonla.org/; End Abortion Now: https://endabortionnow.com/. 

STAND WITH JOSH - Sign the Petition: https://libertycoalitioncanada.com/i-stand-with-josh-alexander/;
